abstract: Baltimore Police Officer Wesley Cagle faces several charges, including  attempted first- and second-degree murder, for shooting burglary suspect Michael Johansen at close range after suspect had been subdued.
lead_paragraph: A Baltimore police officer who the authorities say shot a burglary suspect at close range after he had been subdued is being charged with attempted first- and second-degree murder.

headline.main: Maryland: Officer Faces Attempted Murder Charge
headline.print_headline: Maryland: Officer Faces Attempted Murder Charge

snippet: A Baltimore police officer who the authorities say shot a burglary suspect at close range after he had been subdued is being charged with attempted first- and second-degree murder.
